blocks.title: Resilience Strength Profile

blocks.title: Perfectionism Roots
blocks.body: Dominant factor: {{dominant_trait_tag}}. Subscales PE={{PE_parental}}, ORG={{ORG_order}}, PS={{PS_standards}}, CM={{CM_mistakes}}, DA={{DA_doubts}}.

blocks.title: 14-day Action Plan
blocks.body: Prioritize sleep-activity rhythm reset, cognitive reappraisal journaling, and ERP micro-practice.
